Body:
triples = [('h', ':instance', 'have-org-role-91'), ('a', ':instance',
    'activist'), ('h', ':ARG0', 'a'), ('h', ':ARG2', 'a')]
assert encode(penman.Graph(triples, top='a')) == """(a / activist
   :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91)
   :ARG2-of h)"""
assert encode(penman.Graph(triples, top='h')) == """(h / have-org-role-91
   :ARG0 (a / activist)
   :ARG2 a)"""
